On Wed, Jul 31, 2002 at 04:24:17PM +0100, Kenn Humborg mentioned:
> man sysctl
>    # sysctl -p

 Ah right. Actually, sysctl -a was more helpful - shows why setting
sys.fs.files-nr didn't work..
